mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_hist (user_hist_id, seq, user_id, user_status, change_date, adr, zip_code, adr_detail, phone_no, name, email, pwd_mod_yn, comments, dba_reg_dtm, dba_reg_id, dba_mod_dtm, dba_mod_id) VALUES(#{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{user_pwd}, #{user_email}, #{user_join_date}, #{site_term_agree_yn}, #{p_Info_agree_yn}, #{age_agree_yn}, #{p_info_oth_agree_yn}, #{m_info_rcv_agree_yn}, #{user_status}, #{dba_reg_id});
